mapper.select: SELECT car_code, m.name, color, gear, brand, b.name as bName , cartype, basic_charge, hour6, hour10, hour12, hour_else, fuel_code, is_rent, rent_cnt, t.type as tType FROM car_model m join brand b on m.brand = b.no join car_type t on m.cartype = t.code order by car_code;
mapper.sql: SELECT car_code, m.name, color, gear, brand, b.name as bName , cartype, basic_charge, hour6, hour10, hour12, hour_else, fuel_code, is_rent, rent_cnt, t.type as tType FROM car_model m join brand b on m.brand = b.no join car_type t on m.cartype = t.code
mapper.select: select cartype, count(*) as count from car_type t left join car_model m on t.code = m.cartype group by cartype
